remedies.name: Breath awareness meditation
remedies.description: Spend 10â€“15 minutes daily observing the natural flow of your breath to calm the mind and reduce overthinking.
remedies.safety_notes: Practice in a comfortable posture, stop if you feel dizzy or unwell.

remedies.name: Guided body scan relaxation
remedies.description: Once a day, slowly scan attention from head to toe, relaxing each area and noticing sensations without judgment.
remedies.safety_notes: Practice lying down or seated; avoid if you have conditions that make stillness uncomfortable for long periods.

remedies.name: Support a mental health cause
remedies.description: Once a week, make a small donation or contribution to a trusted mental health or emotional well-being initiative.
remedies.safety_notes: Give only within your financial comfort; focus on sincerity rather than amount.

remedies.name: Small act of kindness
remedies.description: Regularly perform a simple act of kindness for someone in need, such as offering help, listening, or sharing food.
remedies.safety_notes: Ensure your own boundaries and safety are respected while helping others.

remedies.name: Calming affirmation repetition
remedies.description: Repeat a gentle, self-supportive affirmation such as "I am safe and I am learning to relax" for a few minutes daily.
remedies.safety_notes: Use wording that feels emotionally safe and non-triggering for you.

remedies.name: Mindful walking
remedies.description: Take a short daily walk while gently noticing your breath, body sensations and surroundings without analysing them.
remedies.safety_notes: Remain aware of your environment and personal safety while walking; avoid using this practice in unsafe locations.

remedies.name: Grounding phrase repetition
remedies.description: Repeat a simple grounding phrase such as "One step at a time" or "I can handle this moment" for a few minutes whenever anxiety rises.
remedies.safety_notes: Choose phrases that feel genuinely supportive rather than harsh or demanding.
